name: Down To Earth
description:
This is a prototype for the CGA jam going on, the first Jam i'm taking part of. My theme is gravity, and the gameplay consists of falling  while avoiding obstacles and purple hazards. Game was made in Unity.

Controls are move around with arrow keys. Click on Start to start game. Press Escape anywhere during level to return to menu

You can touch the black boxes, but avoid the purple harzards, as well as being crushed by the top. If you get crushed, the prototype resets

 Right now the prototype is just bare bones concept. It just loops the same part endlessly. I plan to put more content in later versions, such as...

 *Graphics

* Audio

*Level Variance

And other general Polish.
